name: fPlayer

screenshots.caption: fPlayer 1.6.1.1 catalan build showing equalizer and sound effects plus main GUI in the background.

short_description:
fPlayer is a full-featured, GPL open-source audio player based on simplicity and usability, aimed to casual users which need a easy-to-use music player.

It features a comprehensive library interface, with a simple quick list playback and ID3, playlist and lyrics support. Plus, it features extra features like a 10-channel equalizer, sound effects (pitch, tempo, echo, reverse playback).

It is available currently in Spanish, Catalan and English.

A new version for Android platforms is to planned be released mid-September 2014.

fPlayer es un reproductor de audio sencillo y de código libre basado en la simplicidad. Dispone de funciones como ecualizador de 10 bandas, efectos de sonido, listas de reproducción y letras, así como editor ID3.

L'fPlayer és un reproductor d'àudio senzill, de programari lliure, basat en la simplicitat. Disposa de funcions com ara equalitzador de 10 canals, efectes de so, llistes de reproducció i lletra de cançons, així com d'editor ID3.
summary: fPlayer is a GPL free audio player for Windows and Android.
